Legend (1320)The Dreaming City

Aphelion’s Rest

Champions

  • Overload (2)

    Appear on far away platforms, and often move behind cover.

  • Unstoppable (2)

Burn

Stasis

Taken Acolytes and Boss have Stasis weapons that slow and freeze you.

Shields

  • Void (many)

    Taken Acolytes all have Void shields.

Modifiers

Epitaph – Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

Notes

Taken Psions duplicate frequently and quickly. Lots of Stasis AOE damage in the boss area.
